name: Lá Camila: A VR Experience
description:
This interactive virtual reality experience transports the viewer to a fantasy world where they must help Camila and her father create clouds from sheep wool to nurture the land below.

The viewer finds themsleves in a virtual hot air balloon as they uncover a miniature farm above the mountain-tops. Camila's life is turned upside down as a series of wildfires burn their home and kill her papá. As the long days pass, Camila struggles to fill her papá's shoes and create new clouds for the dying world below.
